Class Classify

java.lang.Object
  Classify

public class Classify
extends java.lang.Object

Takes root file, parameter file, and save location and outputs the name_crown.txt and name_other.txt files.

Author:
Victoria Arendt

Constructor Method from param file

Parameters:
rootFile - - 3D reconstruction output from root system to be classified
paramFile - - Weka output file corresponding to selected parameters
directory - - Directory for saving output files
name - - prefix of output file names (will be name_crown and name_other)
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - exception thrown if file not found
